participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Fun-loving and adventurous, she values her friendships and seeks independence.
participant_1.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i work took i've a part time job at burger king. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. they are constantly on my back. i do not drink or do drugs or anything.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Reflective and resilient, he has overcome challenges and values a simple life.
participant_2.background: i am a recovering alcoholic. i'm a 45 year old male. i now live in the city. i grew up on a farm.
